ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We acknowledge Professor Hualan Chen for her help to generate the reconstituted polymerase. We thank Professor Ke Xu for her technical support in this study. This study was supported by a Shanghai Key Discipline Grant for Respiratory Diseases (2017ZZ02014) and the Suburban Hospital Clinical Capacity Building Programme of the Shanghai Shenkang Hospital Development Center, China (SHDC12015901).
